title: PBS.Frontline.2016.The.Fantasy.Sports.Gamble.720p.HDTV.x264
description:
The Fantasy Sports Gamble

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Walt Bogdanich, published by PBS broadcasted as part of PBS Frontline series in 2016 - English narration
 
http://docuwiki.net/images/0/0a/The-Fantasy-Sports-Gamble-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

An investigation with The New York Times into fantasy sports and online sports betting. With law enforcement cracking down, the film traces the growth of these booming businesses and goes inside their operations at home and abroad.
